devdoc.details: Assumes cryptographic proof validity was checked before registry interaction.      Ownable for potential future administrative functions (e.g., migration).

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

addReview(bytes32,address,string,uint8,b.details: Adds a new review. Intended to be called only by the ReviewRegistry contract.

params.nullifier: Unique identifier from ZK proof (MUST be unique).
params.productId: ID of the product being reviewed.
params.reviewerAddress: Address of the user submitting the review.

returns._0: The ID of the newly added review.

constructor.details: Constructor sets the initial owner of the contract.

deleteReview(uint256).details: Allows the original reviewer or the contract owner to "delete" a review      by clearing its content. The review entry itself remains.

params.reviewId: ID of the review to delete.

getProductReviews(bytes32).details: Gets all review IDs for a specific product.

getReview(uint256).details: Retrieves a review by its ID.

params.reviewId: ID of the review to retrieve.

getReviewerReviews(address).details: Gets all review IDs submitted by a specific reviewer.

isNullifierUsed(bytes32).details: Public view function to check if a nullifier has been used.      Can be called by ReviewRegistry or external entities.

returns.isUsed: True if the nullifier exists in the usedNullifiers mapping.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateReviewContent(uint256,string).details: Allows the original reviewer to update the content of their review.

params.reviewId: ID of the review to update.

devdoc.title: ReviewStorage

addReview(bytes32,address,string,uint8,b.notice: Checks for nullifier uniqueness before storing.

userdoc.notice: Stores reviews submitted through the ReviewRegistry and enforces nullifier uniqueness.
